Helper function to print a list of 7 players in horizontal stack formation

hstack.Rd

Helper function to print a list of 7 players in horizontal stack formation

Usage

hstack()

Value

A tibble

Examples

hstack
#> function () 
#> {
#>     players <- list(player("H1", show = T, x = c(8), y = c(22), 
#>         alpha = 0.8, frame = 1), player("H2", show = T, x = c(17), 
#>         y = c(22), alpha = 0.8, frame = 1), player("H3", show = T, 
#>         x = c(25), y = c(22), alpha = 0.8, frame = 1), player("C1", 
#>         show = T, x = c(7), y = c(40), alpha = 0.8, frame = 1), 
#>         player("C2", show = T, x = c(15), y = c(40), alpha = 0.8, 
#>             frame = 1), player("C3", show = T, x = c(22), y = c(40), 
#>             alpha = 0.8, frame = 1), player("C4", show = T, x = c(29), 
#>             y = c(40), alpha = 0.8, frame = 1))
#>     bind_rows(players)
#> }
#> <bytecode: 0x559680e8d5b0>
#> <environment: namespace:ggulti>
